sk1.name: Paralyzing Cask
sk1.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

sk2.name: Voodoo Restoration
sk2.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

sk3.name: Maledict
sk3.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.

sk4.name: Death Ward
sk4.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes. The Death Ward has attack range of 700, and attacks every .22 seconds. Level 3 Death Ward bounces once. Lasts 8 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
